nodes.text: Jenna Zan Arbor's apartment was an apartment located on Coruscant in the 500 Republica tower. In 18 BBY it was owned by Jenna Zan Arbor, a scientist who was working for Darth Vader. It was large, taking up the whole floor of one of the tower's upper levels. It overlooked the space lanes of the Galactic City and had a large terrace. It also had a small, windowless room in the back for Linna Naltree, a forced assistant of Zan Arbor.

The same year street kid Trever Flume, a friend of ex-Jedi Ferus Olin, infiltrated the apartment using small grenades. He was looking for a datapad or anything else with information about Zan Arbor. He left after meeting Ry-Gaul, an ex-Jedi who also had broken into the apartment.
